Name: Royal Smile
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This balanced sweet and sour cocktail could put a smile on anyone's face. Unless that is, "one is not amused!" Calvados notes shine through.
History: Adapted from a recipe in David A. Embury 's 1948 seminal book, The Fine Art of Mixing Drinks .
Nutrition: One serving of Royal Smile contains 182 calories
